member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode
member.summary: Represents the caching modes that can be used when creating a new .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Default
member.summary: Default mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Private
member.summary: Private-cache mode. Each connection uses a private cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCacheMode.Shared
member.summary: Shared-cache mode. Connections share a cache. This mode can change the behavior of transaction and table locking.

Only , , , , and are supported.
member.exception: A SQLite error occurs during execution.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync
member.summary: Executes the asynchronously against the database and returns a data reader.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
member.remarks: SQLite does not support asynchronous execution. Use write-ahead logging instead.

member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
member.remarks: SQLite does not support asynchronous execution. Use write-ahead logging instead.

member.summary: Releases any resources used by the connection and closes it.

The isolation level of the transaction.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction
member.summary: Represents a transaction made against a SQLite database.

member.summary: Gets the connection associated with the transaction.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.DbConnection
member.summary: Gets the connection associated with the transaction.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.IsolationLevel
member.summary: Gets the isolation level for the transaction. This cannot be changed if the transaction is completed or closed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.Commit
member.summary: Applies the changes made in the transaction.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.Rollback
member.summary: Reverts the changes made in the transaction.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteTransaction.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases any resources used by the transaction and rolls it back.
member.param: true to release managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Internal.SqliteEngine.UseWinSqlite3
member.summary: Configures Microsoft.Data.Sqlite to use winsqlite3.dll. This is a version of SQLite that ships in Windows 10. This method must be called before any other interaction with SQLite. This API may change or be removed in future releases.

member.summary: The transaction object is not associated with the connection object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Strings.TransactionRequired
member.summary: Execute requires the command to have a transaction object when the connection assigned to the command is in a pending local transaction. The Transaction property of the command has not been initialized.
